CCDD

Class CcddClassesComponent.ArrayListMultiple

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]>
          • CCDD.CcddClassesComponent.ArrayListMultiple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String[]>, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String[]>, java.util.List<java.lang.String[]>, java.util.RandomAccess
    Enclosing class:
    CcddClassesComponent

    protected static class CcddClassesComponent.ArrayListMultiple
extends java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]>
    Array list class with string arrays. The array column for use with the indexOf(), contains(), and sort() methods can be specified (defaults to column 0). Multiple column indices can be provided so that a sort() is based on the first column, and if the same the second column, etc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • compareColumn

        private int[] compareColumn

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArrayListMultiple

        protected ArrayListMultiple(int... compareColumn)
        Array list class constructor with string arrays; sets the comparison column
        Parameters:
        compareColumn - index of the column for indexOf(), contains(), and sort() comparisons. If multiple columns are specified only the first is used for indexOf() and contains() calls; the sort() is based on the items in the column sequence provided

      • ArrayListMultiple

        protected ArrayListMultiple()
        Array list class constructor with string arrays; assumes the first column is the comparison column

    • Method Detail

      • setComparisonColumn

        protected void setComparisonColumn(int... compareColumn)
        Set the comparison column(s)
        Parameters:
        compareColumn - index of the column for indexOf(), contains(), and sort() comparisons. If multiple columns are specified only the first is used for indexOf() and contains() calls; the sort() is based on the items in the column sequence provided

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.Object obj)
        Override the contains method. Compare the input object to the string in the comparison column in each array member in the list and return true is a match is found
        Specified by:
        contains in interface java.util.Collection<java.lang.String[]>
        Specified by:
        contains in interface java.util.List<java.lang.String[]>
        Overrides:
        contains in class java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]>

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(java.lang.Object obj)
        Override the indexOf method. Compare the input object to the string in the comparison column in each array member in the list and return the index of the matching array, or -1 if no match is found
        Specified by:
        indexOf in interface java.util.List<java.lang.String[]>
        Overrides:
        indexOf in class java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]>

      • sort

        protected void sort(CcddConstants.ArrayListMultipleSortType sortType)
        Sort the list based on the comparison column, and convert the column value based on the specified sort type
        Parameters:
        sortType - ArrayListMultipleSortType conversion type; determines how the values are compared (string (case insensitive) or hexadecimal)
